title: Riders’ Association President Backs Plea Deal to Woman Who Endangered Mathieu van der Poel
content:
‘I think this is fair’: Adam Hansen weighs in on spectator who threw cap at Van der Poel’s wheel during Paris-Roubaix.

Read the full article at Riders’ Association President Backs Plea Deal to Woman Who Endangered Mathieu van der Poel on Velo.
author: sstokes
